A movie structured as the bomb, around the bomb. One man’s implosion (fission) catalyzes another’s explosion (fusion), Los Alamos is ground zero. The final hour is the consequences, the chain reaction, the near-zero that is not zero. It’s the perfect film for Nolan to fully meld theory (read: screenwriting) with mathematics (read: filmmaking).

This is truly a monumental achievement from Christopher Nolan , Cillian Murphy truly deserves an Oscar . This movie had me on the edge of my seat the whole time and I didn't even care about the length of it.Easily one of the best 2023 releases.
